head: Stunning 15th & Top Floor Corner with Views, Doorman, Utilities
post: Stunning 15th floor corner studio apartment with panoramic city views from Twin Peaks to the Transamerica Pyramid from five oversized windows. This gorgeous top floor apartment is located in the Hamilton Condominiums -- a landmark 1930s Art Deco building which was originally the Alexander Hamilton Hotel. If youre looking for exceptional city apartment living in an extremely well maintained historic San Francisco building with tons of character and great residents, this is the place! This elegant and immaculate apartment has been lovingly restored by the owner with attention to every detail. The apartment features a sleeping alcove, separate walk in closet area/extra room, open kitchen and full bath with tub and shower. The apartment has new professional paint and new quality carpet throughout. Rent includes all utilities - heat, water, electricity and garbage. Rent also includes a 24 hour security/doorperson and full gym access. A 12-month lease is required. No smoking, no drugs. Hamilton building amenities include: 24-hr security guard/doorperson Package receiving service Brand new fully-equipped 24 hour gym Completely restored lobby with marble fireplace, grand piano and free Wi-Fi Roof deck with panoramic views Courtyard with fountain Recently remodeled ballroom with 80 TV, kitchen and more (great for parties) State-of-the-art laundry room Community room Passenger and freight elevators Building hosted parties and events year round Onsite management Highly-professional maintenance staff Additional building info here: Conveniently located on the 38 and 27 bus lines and walking distance to MUNI/BART, Downtown, Union Square, Civic Center, restaurants, Symphony, Opera and various theaters. Apartment is available immediately.

head: Well Maintained Furnished Tutor in Kensington, available 8/1
post: This beautiful and well maintained Tutor style home comes with tasteful furnishing and ready for you to move into. All you need is your personal belongings. Upon entering the gate youll be greeted with beautiful grounds, lawn, mature trees, deck and patio. All fully fenced. Upon entering the house, youll be welcomed into a light filled living room with inviting fireplace and hardwood floors. Formal dining room with hardwood floors and an abundance of windows and light adjacent to kitchen. Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel Thermodore six burner gas stove, stainless steel refrigerator, stainless steel ovens 2, microwave, food warmer, Granite counters and limestone flooring. Breakfast nook with built-in bench. House offers total of four bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms and 2 half bathrooms. Upstairs there are three bedrooms and two bathrooms; Spacious master bedroom with private remodeled bathroom and double closets with views of the bay. Two additional bedroom and a full remodeled bathroom. Above the garage is the fourth bedroom and half bath, used and furnished as TV cave room now. One half bath serving the lower living area. Two car attached garages. Washer and dryer in the basement. Central heating. Pets might be considered on case by case basis with a pet deposit. No smoking. Includes gardener service. Tax records show the house at 2463 sqft., but owner believes it to be 2700 sqft plus or minus. Agent has not checked sqft. Looking for one year lease. May consider longer term. Available 8/1/2013. Good credit and verification of income and employment is required. First month and security deposit will be required. If interested in viewing this property, please send an email with your detailed information and phone#. Soheila Smith Real Estate, Soheila Smith, DRE# 01179226

head: SPECTACULAR LOFT between Lake Merritt & Oakland Embarcadero

Evening sunsets are spectacular from this unit. This loft is located at Parkside Studios between the Oakland Waterfront and Lake Merritt. Only a few blocks from the Lake Merritt BART station, this location also gives you easy access to all Bay Area freeways. Common area amenities include a huge landscaped deck, a free on-site laundry room, and one off-street parking space. Rent is $2195. per month plus common area services and utilities of $168. head: Very Nice House
post: Very Nice House This place has magic. This is a one story 3 bedroom, one bath home, on a very large flat lot, with creek frontage. It has a large enclosed front yard with a japanese feel, with a lot of bamboo, gravel ground cover, and a beautiful persimmon tree. The front yard can fit as many as 6 cars in a pinch. There is a garage that can fit a small car, which I, and most people who have lived here use as a work and storage space. The house has dark finished wood floors, with the exception of the slate tile in the bath, and carpet in the front bedroom. The living room and dining room have views to both the front and rear of the house, and a wood burning fireplace with raised hearth. The kitchen had been remodeled with high end older appliances, Sub Zero refrig., gaggenau convection oven, bosch dishwasher, trash compator, garabage disposal, and gas cook top. There is also ample cabinet space, with large pull out drws. The kitchen also contains a front loading washer and dryer. All bedrooms have views to the rear heritage Oaks, that are really spectacular. The side yard is very large and covered with pea gravel for low maintence, also very private. Beyond the side yard is another natural untamed yard that is pretty and leads down to the creek. This is a magical place to live. Available August 1st Rent is ...................... $2,850. Security deposit ...... $2,850. Cleaning deposit ........ $500. Total move in costs...... $6,200. Tenant pays all utilities. Tenant must provide excellent references, and credit reports. Dogs and cats welcome but must be well behaved. Any questions or to set up a time to view please call Josh (415) 999-1865 Please do not disturb tenant he is such a nice guy.

Were already $100 a month less than our competition, and we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! Youll feel like a millionaire living in one of the most beautiful parts of California, surrounded by parks, forests, and the Delta. Our spacious, light-filled units have wonderful amenities and well-designed floorplans. The park-like grounds have tranquil water features running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. All units have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and fully-equipped fitness center. A convenient shopping center is across the street and BART access is practically on our front steps. Located near the 4 and 680 junction, we are close to everything you want to do in the Bay Area. The Delta and all of the great water related activities that go with it. . . fishing, sailing, treasure hunting. . . is just 5 minutes away! Give us a call at 925-228-0760

head: SCAM ALERT tenantverified.com SCAM ALERT
post: Theres a company (tenantverified.com) who is advertising fake housing for rent on CL. The scammers ad on CL makes anyone feel welcome to apply by stating that theyll work with anyone with bad credit and a criminal history. The advertised housing for rent is also advertised at a very competitive rate which obviously is a tactic to draw more people in. When you inquire about the home listed for rent you get a reply with details of the fake home for rent and you are asked to go to a site for a background check called tenantverified.com. Of course this background check is not free and the scammer asks that you forward them all of your personal information obtained from the site. When you reply to their email, another reply email from a different email address is sent to you with an additional scam to obtain even more information asking you to prove youre an actual person and not a bot and youre then directed to a so called verification page where you input your phone number. From there you dont get a response and then eventually youll realize the house posted on CL was bogus and now youre out $40 and your information is in the hands of the scammers who are obviously working for tenantverified.com

head: 1br apartment on a 3rd floor available on Saratoga Ave
post: Hi, I need to find someone to rent out my apartment. The move-in dates are negotiable. The apartment complex has a 30 day guarantee as well (can move out or move apartments within the complex without penalty). It is a nice 3rd floor 1 bedroom corner unit with a new microwave, electric stove and laminated floor/carpet. Apartment comes with a fireplace and a sunny balcony. There are 2 big mirrored closets in the bedroom which is nice and gives ample storage space. The AC is only in the living room, and there is a new ceiling fan in the dining area as well. Apartment doesnt face any road- so minimal noise.You would only have one neighbor who is a very quiet nice man. Apartment complex is pet friendly (if you have a large dog then you have to rent on the 1st floor though, and I believe there is an additional deposit/pet fee which needs to be paid). Every week they provide complementary tennis lessons, there are several tennis courts and basketball courts on the premises. Nice gym is also available. There is a large swimming pool and BBQ pits next to the pool. It is a huge complex which has several buildings each of which has its own laundry room open 24/7 (card operated). I lived here for 2 months but now I got a job in Foster City so commute and gas expenses are slowly killing me. I can not sublease this place per their rules, one has to go through the main office and rent at the current market price. I pay 1720$ (utilities not included) right now. If you are interested in my apartment then let me know. I would pay you 500$ which will help out to lower your monthly rent whatever it might be. You can check out additional information from this website: The place is not called Oakwood anymore though. For current pricing you can call them 408-551-6900. Thanks!

Excellent location. Bedroom #1 - Small side room with closet. Bedroom #2 - Petite bedroom with large low closet/storage. Miniature closet door. Bedroom #3 - Full size side bedroom with closet. Bedroom #4 - Large rear bedroom opens to exclusive terrace, full closet - suitable to share. Bedroom #5 - Big rear bedroom looks onto yard with walk-in closet - suitable to share. (no closet) Bedroom #7 - Full size with closet, built in bench rear downstairs room - suitable to share. Looks onto rear yard. Bedroom #8 - Small downstairs room with closet. head: Fully Furnished  Guest House w/ Utilities Included
post: ********************* THIS SINGLE OCCUPANCY MONTHLY RATE IS FOR 3 OR MORE MONTHS. ONE & TWO MONTH RATE IS $1875 ****************************************************************************************** This is a fully furnished 800 square foot detached studio guest house, nestled in the quiet San Jose Cambrian neighborhood. It is located south of Camden Avenue between Leigh & Union Avenues. While fairly secluded, the location has ready access to Highways 85, 880 and 280 for convenient access to San Jose, Cupertino, Sunnyvale and the rest of Silicon Valley. This facility is designed for temporary (3 Month), medium-term (6+ months) or even a year; executive /commuter, single occupancy (or double occupancy MAX), customers who are looking for a more relaxed and open environment than any hotel or motel can offer. Would be perfect for a traveling nurse or other professional. It is a detached guesthouse with its own private entrance and plenty of street parking. There is a remodeled restroom with tiled shower and a full kitchen with a sink, gas stove, microwave, refrigerator, toaster, coffeemaker, and a small table for two. The apartment is fully furnished and appointed with plush carpeting & rugs, draperies, leather couch and a solid oak desk. It comes with basic cable, a DVD player and 802.11n/g broadband wireless Internet access. The unit has its own AC and heat. This is a smoke free, no pet environment. Thank you for understanding. Go to: for more photos. Rates: Per Month - $1775 (for 3 months+)/ $1875 for one & two month stays Additional charge of $200/Month for double occupancy. Credit & Background Check - $50 per applicant, non-refundable Reservation Deposit - $1000 (applied toward first months rent) Security Deposit - $1775. Cleaning Fee - $150 per stay. All payments via Cash, Cashiers Check. No Credit Cards or personal checks, sorry. The Reservation Deposit holds the unit for you and is applied toward your inital payment upon execution of the agreement. Longer stays will receive preferance in selection. There is an additional non-refundable credit/background check fee of $50 for each applicant. Rates include all utilities, cable & internet access. The Security Deposit will be returned within 10 days of checkout pending confirmation of no damage, no need for extensive cleaning or excessive/wasteful utility usage. Reply to this post with your phone and contact info for more information and reservations.

head: Private home on 1/4 acre in Santa Rosa
post: This is a house behind another home, down a private road-it sits on the back of 1/2 acre. House was built in 2005, it has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, big single car garage. 1,000 sq, feet of living space with great room - kitchen and living/dining area. Washer/dryer (not included) with pantry. Granite counters in both kitchen and bath, also a soaking tub. Large 10 walk in closet in master and big closet in entry (6 6) and 2nd wall to wall bedroom closet (10), 10 ceilings, skylights and 6 crown moldings throughout. 10 garage door and deep enough for work truck (23 X 13 6). Large asphalt area off the road and behind the 2nd unit and is gated - room for parking many cars or RV, boat, trucks, etc. Great big separate area for growing vegetables, too. 1 small enclosed yard. 23X20 Low density area, home is surrounded by acreage, but one minute to stores, 3 minutes to freeway. It is like the best of both worlds-feels like country, but in the city. Very quiet and peaceful. With no 2 story houses in neighborhood, there is no one to look into yards. Best part of these homes are the way they are built. 2X6 outside construction (normal is 2 X 4) with extra insulation, concrete masonite boards (fire proof), but looks like ship lap wood, which soundproofs the homes. With more pillars than needed, that are deeper and wider than code for foundation-very earthquake resistant-it actually has a solidness you can feel as you walk on it. Large home can be rented with this home or separately. Security deposit is $3200. Pet deposit is extra. Northwest area of Santa Rosa in low density area. 5 acres behind and to one side. House cannot be seen from road. Please do not drive down the private road or onto property without an appointment. 2236 Marsh Rd. It is the back house. Available now.

head: Half acre with 2 newer homes in Santa Rosa
post: 1st house has 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, big 2 car garage. 2200 sq. ft. Built in 2002 with custom redesigning in 2005. All the upgrades! Formal living room with cathedral ceilings with entrance has floor to ceiling columns. Dining room is a separate room with a bay window. Both rooms are fauxed and have dental 5 crown molding and designer light fixtures. Kitchen and family room combo. Eat in area is a bay window with eat in area. Island is brown granite with matte black granite sink and bar seating for 4. Matching cabinet refrigerator and dishwasher. 2 ovens-micro/convection and regular/convection. Gas cook top. And light maple natural hard wood floors. The custom carved fireplace in family room has a gas lighter and is wood burning. Master is large and has an 8 foot slider door for lots of light. Dental crown moldings in master bed and bath. Bath has bay window, 2 recessed Corian sinks with tan and brownish tile and travertine floors. 6 jacuzzi and a separate room for extra large shower with 2 heads. Master closet (used to be 4th bedroom) with sit down and built in maple cabinets, plus built in shoe area and closet organizers. There are 3 large linen and 1 coat closet . Washer and dryer closet area with cabinets near bedrooms. The other 2 bedrooms are 12 X 13 and I have added extra closets. Very energy efficient home with zone heating and air conditioning. PG&E; is very low-for both houses in coldest months this year was $265. So well insulated, air conditioning is rarely on. Large landscaped, fenced area between homes. 2nd house was built in 2005. It has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, big single car garage. 1,000 sq, feet with great room - kitchen and living/dining area. Washer/dryer with pantry. Granite counters in both kitchen and bath, also a soaking tub. 10 ceilings, skylights and 6 crown moldings throughout. 10 garage door and deep enough for work truck (23 X 14 6). Large asphalt area off the road and behind the 2nd unit and is gated - room for parking 10 cars or RV, boat, trucks, etc. Great big separate area for growing vegetables, too. Low density area, home is surrounded by acreage, but one minute to stores, 3 minutes to freeway. It is like the best of both worlds-feels like country, but in the city. Very quiet and peaceful. No 2 story houses in neighborhood, there is no one to look into yards. $6,500 deposit and pet deposit is extra. Neither home can be sublet. Northwest area of Santa Rosa in low density area. 2236 Marsh Rd. Available now.

head: Furnished newer single level custom home on 1/4 acre in Santa Rosa
post: Have the best of both worlds. It is like the country in the city! Single level with no 2 level houses in neighborhood of low density homes. Newer designer furniture and accessories included 2002 built extra sturdy. 3 huge bedrooms/2 baths with large 2 car garage. This portion of Santa Rosa-homes have acreage-this home has 1/2 acre that shares with a granny. The granny may be also available-(together or separately) Feels like the country, is quiet and peaceful, but is 1 mile to Safeway. Every upgrade you can think of-$50k worth! 9 ceilings, except cathedral in formal living room. Formal dining room. Crown molding throughout and entry has floor to ceiling pillars. Used to be a 4 bedroom, but I took the bedroom closest to the master and turned it into a very large Master with a gigantic walk in closet with sit down vanity. Master bath has Corian double sinks, travertine floors, a 6 whirlpool bath and a double head ex. large master shower. Kitchen is an enormous great room with family room. Large Granite island with room for 4 stools, island has the sink. Italian tile on rest of counter tops with custom cabinets, cabinet dishwasher and refrigerator. 2 convection ovens - one with regular oven, the other with microwave and gas cook top. Custom fireplace in family room. along with plantation shutters and hardwood floors. Washer and dryer are next to bedrooms. Extra large closets in all rooms, coat closet and 3 linen closets. Extra insulation along with heating and cooling in zones with 2 thermostats for small PGE bills. Central heating and air conditioning. head: Amazing Fully-Furnished Short & Long- Term Rental
post: AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER 26, 2013 FOR MINIMUM OF 1 MONTH. The perfect home base for your work or vacation! This cozy apartment is walking distance from San Franciscos financial district and just one block from North Beachs famous restaurants. This is a great neighborhood, walking distance to everything with insanely fast Internet. Comes with a pull-out sofa that converts to a queen-sized bed. If its R&R; youre after, youll appreciate the amazing custom kitchen, equipped by a Cordon-Blue trained chef, the comfy couch, and the big screen TV with all the usual cable channels. If you feel the need to be active, try the XBOX. If you insist on leaving the great indoors, try a drink on the roof deck at sunset to start with. If you get hungry, North Beach is just half a block. And if you insist on going into work, the financial district is a nice 10 minute walk. We didnt just make the place comfy either. We made it greener. Most lights are low power LEDs, the appliances are all energy-star rated, and the hot water heater is a high efficiency, continuous flow heater that combines energy efficiency with a literally unlimited capacity. The only limit on your time in the shower will be your conscience. One parking spot for a compact car and available on a first-come, first-served basis. NO smoking and NO pets!

head: FULLY FURNISHED Excellent Rental Short-& Long-Term

You can also walk 10 minutes and get to BART which goes directly to the airport or downtown as well. Boutique shops, great restaurants are just short walking distance. Whole Foods is also close by. Unit is on 2nd floor of a 3-floor building. Inside is the expansive and completely redone kitchen with modern appliances, including dishwasher, awaits your gourmet cooking. Living room has big LCD TV and full cable so you can verify that theres nothing worth watching on TV. Theres an Apple TV box as well attached to the TV, for the BYO crowd. Couch is a pull-out bed queen sized. Washer and dryer in building. For the more technically oriented, theres 50mb broadband, WiFi, a printer/copier/fax and an Apple TV in the house as well so you will not be out of touch. The roof has hot-water solar (feel free to take long afternoon showers), most of the lights are LEDs (many of them using the new L-prize winner Philips LED bulbs) and the home is equipped with smart power and heat management systems. Parking available for compact cars and only on first-come, first-served basis. NO smoking and NO pets

head: FULLY FURNISHED Brick Walled Rental

Located across the street from the new San Francisco baseball park and the main city train station, this place is perfect for work in the city, commuting down to Silicon Valley, or having a fantastic bay area vacation. Inside this spacious, modern loft you can relax, work, or entertain. With blazing fast wireless Internet (50 megabits), a large desk, printer, scanner, and copier, youll find the loft much more productive than your office. This loft is luxuriously furnished in a contemporary style and decorated with original artwork, antiques, and thick woolen carpets from New Zealand. Distractions from work include two flat screen TVs with premium cable TV channels and a gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances, granite counters, all equipped down to the right details by a Cordon-Bleu-trained chef. A Bosch washer/dryer provides personal convenience, but a dry cleaner is located within half a city block. The neighborhood is loaded with amazing restaurants in unique industrial spaces, not to mention San Franciscos best night clubs. head: One Hawthorne: Furnished or Unfurnished, Avail July
post: One Hawthorne: 645 Howard Street #17F When your new home is at One Hawthorne, you have one of the most commanding views of San Francisco. From Twin Peaks to Sutro Tower across the city skyline to the top of the SF MOMA--your new outlook is nothing less than simply spectacular. In this corner 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom home, you may choose to enjoy the views from the comfort of your couch or al fresco on your balcony or terrace. Either way, the net effect is nothing less than transformative. The spacious living area is unlike most condominiums or apartments. With near floor-to-ceiling glass surrounding two corners, the indoors and outdoors become one. Designer upgrades include exquisite hardwood floors, custom light fixtures, window treatments. The highlight is a sky view balcony that provides a seamless opportunity to take in the skyline. Enjoy cocktails or morning coffee as you overlook the city. Whether you use your kitchen primarily as a social space or as a traditional cooking venue, great beauty, refinement and technological efficiency are all built right in. This chefs kitchen offers the finest appliance suites, beginning with Bosch gas cooktops and ovens, Sub-Zero refrigerator, microwave ovens. The heart of your home is clad with beautiful natural grey polished quartzite countertops, stone backsplashes, signature white acrylic Studio Becker soft-close cabinets, and polished chrome Watermark fixtures. The master bedroom is perfectly appointed with hardwood floors, Hunter Douglas window treatments, a walk-in closet with organizers, and access to a second outdoor deck. Your master bath looks and feels like your own personal spa. Designed with natural stone tile and accented with Kohler fixtures, the master bath is a place to cleanse and refresh, invigorate and relax. Your master bath offers a separate tub and glass-enclosed shower and dual vanities. Enjoy world-class amenities in your high-rise home. An on-site fitness center with cooling terrace, 4,000 square foot roof terrace, doorman and concierge services, are among some of the many building amenities. If location really is everything, One Hawthorne has it all. Rising graciously above the vibrant and fashionable downtown San Francisco, One Hawthorne residents benefit from close proximity to fabulous shopping in Union Square, the finest dining, and attractions at The Metreon, and nightlife. The convenient downtown location connects you to major local and regional transportation assuring an easy commute to virtually anywhere in the Bay Area. Everything you want or need is just minutes away. This level of lifestyle underscores a fresh urban neighborhood attitude in which people work, study, play, shop, and eat close to home. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo at One Hawthorne is available unfurnished for $7,500 (12 month lease term) or furnished for $9,500 (3-12 month lease terms).  1,330 sq. ft. (per owner)  Poliform sofa, chairs, and bed in guest room DRE# 01369396 DRE# 01875716

head: Executive Home Over Looking the Bay
post: A gorgeous, spacious, tri-level home in the Fairview area of the Hayward Hills. This is a 4 bedroom, 3 bath house with a 3 car garage. It is located in Ridgeview Estates with a fantastic view of the Bay and a $100,000 backyard that could be found in Sunset Magazine. Just a 5 minute drive to the Cal State East Bay- Hayward Campus and within walking distance of East Ave Park which has several hiking trails, basketball courts, picnic areas and a childrens playground.This house is perfect for entertaining or to relax and enjoy your privacy. The entry level offers a formal living room, a formal dining room and an eat-in-kitchen with a sliding glass door to the backyard. Upstairs you will find 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has 2 closets, a walk-in and a wardrobe closet with mirrored doors, a fireplace and french doors leading to a private deck looking out over the backyard. The master bath has a double vanity, and a shower over a jacuzzi tub. Acros the hall you will find the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms and the 2nd bathroom with a shower over tub. Downstairs you will find a large family room, with a fireplace, a wet bar and a sliding glass door to the back patio, down the hall is the 4th bedroom, the 3rd bathroom(shower only), the laundry, a utility closet and the inside access to the garage. The backyard is exquisite with many tiers connected by a bridge leading from the patio to the top of the hill. Some of the amenities include an outdoor kitchen with a built in bbq, refrigerator, sink, stove top, Bose sound system, sit up bar, with granite countertops. There is also a Koi pond, 2 waterfalls, a hot tub and lots of outdoor furnishings. The house has wall to wall carpet through out with tile in the entry and the bathrooms, and linoleum in the kitchen. A gardener will be included to maintain the yards and landscape. For information and/or appointment to see the home contact Roy Webster at (510)581-1521.

head: Serene, light filled 2 BR + Ofc, 2 ba. country home
post: (Please note: The house is UNFURNISHED. The photos show a previous tenants furnishings.) IS THIS THE ONE FOR YOU? A two bedroom + office/ 2 bath home that is inviting and offers a lot of light and space, with a great flow of energy throughout. This charming, light-filled home really does have a special feel. The open floor plan, skylights, many windows and high ceilings all contribute to an aesthetic simplicity and feeling of serenity. This 1600+ sq. ft. home was remodeled completely from the ground up about ten years ago. It had been one of the original homes in the area. It retains a charming country cottage feel even though everything is brand new - plumbing & electrical, kitchen, flooring, furnace, all windows and doors - EVERYTHING was newly installed when remodeled, except for the woodburning stove and hearth that we left in the living room. The exterior is surrounded by greenery, with ample space to garden if desired. There is a newish 10x12 storage shed and half of the old red barn available for covered parking and/or storage. Walk past the covered brick porch through the front door and into a very large living room with high ceiling with skylights and windows providing good light in every room. High ceilings throughout. Each bedroom and the kitchen have sliding glass doors for outside access. The large kitchen (dw/fridge/gas stove) has lots of counter space and cabinets, two skylights, and room for a good sized table. There is a laundry room off the kitchen, as well as another dining (or whatever) area. Right off the living room is a good sized room suitable for an office (no closets so we dont call it a bedroom.) Off the left side of the living room is one bedroom with a large bathroom attached, another equally large bathroom, and a hall leading to the other bedroom. Both bedrooms have high ceilings and good natural light. It really is a special place both inside and out. Great neighborhood and great neighbors, too. About 10 minutes to hwy 101 via 116; and 5 minutes to the heart of downtown Sebastopol. Most of our previous tenants have been single women who were looking for a special place to live. No lease required (month-to-month is fine) but most have stayed 3 years or more before life events took them elsewhere. There is a well and septic, so no water bills need be paid. OK, after all that.... the rent! It is $2,350 per month. Move-in requires first months rent + 1 1/2 months security deposit. If that is in your ballpark, we invite you to come experience the house for yourself and see if it matches your desires. OPEN HOUSE for viewing will be Saturday, June 22, from 1-3pm. If interested, please call Jeff at 707-328-6993 or Maxine at 707-824-1856 to arrange a viewing. All the best, Jeff

The living room features a large HD TV, Blue-Ray player and a superior sound system and the master bedroom features a second HD TV and a Roku. head: 2bed/1bath Short-term Furnished Rental House-All Utilities Included-CC
post: AVAIL IN SEPTEMBER: Furnished House For Rent/Lease - 2BR/1 full BA - Berkeley, California - Perfect as a Short-Term Rental 7 blocks from UC Berkeley and Downtown Berkeley (near MLK and Bancroft). Perfect for short-term rental (see below in pricing for details) - No need to pay utilities or for furnishings: everything is included. Fully remodeled house - quiet tree lined street - private fenced-in backyard (other duplex unit has its own separate backyard). 2 bedrooms (2BR) - one full bathroom (tiled floor) with tub and shower (1BA). Hard wood floors - fireplace - no apartment above unit - only one common wall - lots of southern light - furnace for heat (separate WisperWarm heating in bathroom). All utilities at no extra cost: high-speed broadband internet (both wireless and via an Ethernet cable), 40 HD Flat Panel Smart Internet TV with wireless keyboard with Netflix streaming - plus a DVD player, phone service (free calling to all of US), and of course all basic utilities as well: electricity, natural gas/heat, water, and trash service. Bedding and linens included: all sheets and towels are 100% organic cotton. Fully furnished: Washer/Dryer (W/D), all kitchen equipment (pots and pans, microwave, toaster oven, coffee/espresso maker), sofa, tables, chairs, beds, HD TV, etc. Perfect for visiting Cal faculty (10 minute walk to campus), or as a corporate apartment rental, or as a vacation rental. Great alternative to a hotel. Accommodates up to 5 persons. Environmental considerations: (1) House is carbon neutral - offsets are purchased every year from TerraPass (www.terrapass.com) based on energy used at the house. (2) Only environmentally friendly cleaners are used. (3) All linens are made with organic cotton. (4) Green Purchasing Policy in place. 7 blocks from University of California at Berkeley (Cal) campus (10 minute walk - about 1/2 mile). 6 blocks from (train/subway) and all downtown amenities (restaurants, shops, cinemas, banks, library, buses). 25 minute ride on the BART (train/subway) to Downtown San Francisco. 4 blocks from large grocery store (supermarket). Close to everything, but a very quiet residential neighborhood. Very easy access to highway I-80. 10 minute drive to downtown Oakland or Emeryville. One block to Berkeleys Bike network. AVAILABLE: Year Round; (See to check dates) (see below for minimum booking fee) Rates vary by length of booking. In general, the minimum rental period is 2 weeks, but on occasion, shorter stays of 10 nights or 5 night maybe available. Please inquiry. Additionally, at certain times, the minimum booking duration is more than 2 weeks (sometimes as much as 2 months) - again, please inquiry with your dates, and I can respond. OVERALL RATE STRUCTURE: Booking Length: 11 Months or more ==> $3350/month; Booking Length: between 6 Months and 11 Months ==> $3550/month; Booking Length: between 2 Months and 6 Months ==> $3800/month; Booking Length: between 4 weeks and 8 weeks ==> $1150/week; Booking Length: between 19 nights and 27 nights ==> $190/night; Booking Length: between 11 nights and 18 nights ==> $210/night; Booking Length: 10 nights or less ==> $230/night; All above rates includes all utilities (including high-speed internet), furnishings, and linens. head: Love the Ocean? Beautiful 1BR + Office w/ Spectacular Views & Parking!
post: Located at 38th Ave. and Geary, on the top floor (3rd floor, no elevator), this is a really beautiful 1BR/1BA corner apartment with office! The lovely hardwood foyer welcomes you centrally into the apartment where the spectacular panoramic view stretches out in front of you! You will enjoy light to lift your spirits everyday as the sun rises in the East, crosses over the apartment with warm South light all day, and finally sets in the West over the sparkling Pacific Ocean with fabulous sunsets! The living room is spacious and tastefully carpeted in a beautiful charcoal grey. The bedroom is carpeted in the same manner, is also spacious with new double paned Bay windows, and enjoys the same fabulous views east, south and west. The kitchen has recently been remodeled with beautiful granite counters, a nicely tiled floor, gas stove, refrig, (no dishwasher) a charming spice rack, pantry and plenty of cabinet space for the busy cook. The bathroom is also nicely tiled and has a tub and shower combination. There are 2 additional closets in the hallway, one for linens and one for coats, and there is a huge closet in the living room that is the size of some New York apartments! All the rooms have lovely glass, French doors that open up or close off rooms to accommodate your needs and whims. This apartment has a wonderful feel to it; it is very cozy, yet spacious and flowing, and the views that it boasts are spectacular! Not to mention that your energy bill will be lessened by the wonderful southern sunlight that pours in all day long (on sunny days!) Lincoln Park is only one block away for hiking and biking. And the fun Balboa neighborhood is only 2 blocks away, where you will find shops of all kinds and restaurants of American, Italian, Mexican, Chinese, Thai and Japanese cuisine. There is also a Movie theatre, a popular Sidewalk café, Hardware store, Video store, banks, fresh Produce markets, an organic Free Trade Bakery, places to grab a sandwich, and much, much more! Also close to Ocean Beach, the Cliff House, and only 4 blocks to Golden Gate Park. Public transportation is a snap, as right on Geary you can catch the 38 Geary busline which will take you all the way downtown and youll probably even get a seat! One car garage parking is included in the price. Washer and dryer in the building with a full laundramat in the next block. Landlord pays water and garbage. Sorry, no pets. For a private showing, Call Gene @ (415) 794-6644

There is a lovely very open chefs kitchen - the bathrooms are large and each has a tub. The unit is very large 1100 sq ft and the back room facing the patio would make a lovely office or bedroom. Both upstairs units have dogs which share the yard. It MAY be possible for this unit to have a dog provided the dog was walked and allowed only in the gated side run and not given yard access under any circumstances. A home office would work for the right person who doesnt mind some noise. Harmonious community is important in this triplex. There is some noise transference between all of the units, but strive to keep this to a minimum. We value open communication. Everyone participates in taking out the trash and recycling on Thursday nights and in keeping the property in order. The yards are kept up by the owner. Water/garbage included in rent. Annual Festivities- -Novato Festival of Art, Wine, & Music - June -Infineon Raceway -NASCAR & NHRA -Downtown Farmers Market -April to September -Bike Night - May -Nostalgia Days - August -July 4th Parade -Marin County Fair - Our 2BD2BTH is located on our 3rd floor with large retail windows that face south - lots of warm sunlight. Beautiful view of city and Novatos rolling hills. This particular floor plan includes a large 7 7.5 den space (great for computer room, storage space, or nursery). There is a walk-in closet near the entrance and another in the 2nd bedroom. post: We are proud to offer for rent a completely updated charming 1936 California bungalow, 3 bedroom 2 bathroom in the Laurel District of Oakland. Rich walnut stained hardwood floors throughout the main level of the home is inviting as you enter through the covered front porch. The home is accented by generous windows allowing a balanced flow of natural light and a gas fireplace for those cozy evenings. A fabulous chefs kitchen with granite counters is complimented by shaker style maple cabinetry and gourmet stainless steel appliances. Continuing on the main level is two bedrooms and one full bath. The lower level master bedroom has a large walk-in closet and master bathroom with granite counters, double sink and a large custom tiled shower with multiple sprayers, featuring a rainfall shower head. The family room and laundry room completes the downstairs of this wonderful home. The enclosed rear yard is newly landscaped with a level lawn area, rock wall and a colorful flower bed. Bamboo contributes to privacy of the yard and the concrete patio is great for entertaining or relaxing. A single car garage is available for a vehicle or additional storage. This home is approximately 1607+ square feet with features that include: *Custom Painted *Dishwasher *Garbage Disposal *Washer and Dryer *Gas Appliances *Alarm System Available *Convenient to BART and Public Transportation; Trans-bay line to San Francisco, AC Transit to Fruitvale BART. *Typically 10-15 Minute Drive to UC Berkeley & Downtown Oakland *Easy freeway access to San Francisco and the Greater Bay Area *Close to Redwood Day School and St. Lawrence OâToole School *Close to La Farine, Farmer Joes Market, Peets Coffee, Many Major Banks, Luckys Supermarket, Dimond Library and Near Local Parks and the East Bay Regional Park System. *Laurel Outdoor Movies Last Saturdays of the Month June-October *Laurel Street Fair August 10, 2013 *October Fest October 5, 2013 Terms: Tenants Pay All Utilities Owner Pays Gardener Minimum One Year Lease This Property is Non-Smoking Pets Negotiable Click on the link below for Laurel District Services, Dining, and Shopping, Fitness and Beauty and Events CONTACT: Bonita Chinn or Marty Chan Phone: 510-584-9078 Email: rentals@discoinvest.com 07/10/2013 Created on June 19, 2013 16:57 PDT

head: Close To Everything & Affordable!
post: Cheesecake Factory, Claim Jumpers, Broadway Plaza, Sunvalley Mall, the movies, etc., is just 5-15 minutes away, yet you are not in the middle of all that noise and chaos. Even more, you dont have to pay the price for rent as you do in Walnut Creek and Pleasant Hill. Were already $100 a month less than our competition, and we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! You could use those savings for your next trip to the beach! Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled Muir Creek Apartments have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! The park-like grounds have tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. Conveniently located across the street from the well-stocked Village Oaks shopping center, and BART access is practically on our front steps. The new Amtrak station will take you to Sacramento fast, but if you want to drive were not even a block away from Highway 4 and just minutes from the 680. The County offices, marina, and local wineries are all nearby. Give us a call at 925-228-0760

head: Clubview Apartments-South San Francisco
post: Bargain HARD if you want to live here. They have approximately a dozen vacant units at the present time. (Notice how they have dropped the asking rents on Craigslist over the past few months). There will be more vacancies as many tenants are being subject to rent increases and are planning to leave. Best advice is to hold off renting for a month or two, if you can. Youll likely have even more vacancies at that point and can then really bargain hard. By the way, DONT believe the hype from the property manager about living here. There are no designer anything...the units are tired-looking, worn-out, etc. Also, lots of pot-smoking in the building...Thats a plus for some but bad for most! Caveat emptor!

head: Executive Single Family Estate in Los Altos Hills with PaloAlto School
post: Beautiful 4BD/3.5BA Gated French country executive estate situated on a 1.22 acres in a private cul-de-sac. Three-car garage, pool and spa with retractable electric pool cover. Custom built by Bob Owen with fine craftsmanship throughout; lots of space and light in every room. The Formal entry has limestone floors and opens to an inviting living room with hardwood floor and a 10-foot ceiling with expansive windows overlooking the landscaped grounds and an elegant fireplace. The living room leads to the formal dining room with hardwood floor and coffered ceiling and a large bay window overlooking the patio and pool. The Large gourmet kitchen features hardwood floors, granite counter tops, Sub-Zero refrigerator, double convection ovens, built-in microwave, a lovely breakfast nook area with a 9-foot ceiling and additional cabinets. The laundry/mud room has additional upper and lower cabinets with access to the 3-car garage and a full bath servicing the pool. The family room has hardwood floor, handsome coffered ceilings with woodwork and beams, built-in wet bar and wood-burning stone fireplace. There is an elegant half bath with marble counter top servicing the main living areas. The upstairs consists of three large bedrooms with hardwood floor sharing a bathroom with granite counter top/dual sink and shower over tub. Master bedroom suite has a private balcony, huge walk-in closet, boudoir-style stone floor bathroom with Jacuzzi tub and stall shower. The private pool and spa are surrounded by natures beauty. Conveniences include built-in vacuum system, dual-zone heating and A/C, alarm system with optional connectivity to fire and police. Tons of storage space in kitchen, pantry, and laundry center, under stairwell, and garage. This house is in an excellent neighborhood, across from the Westwind Barn. Near top Silicon Valley businesses, easy commute routes to 280 and 85, and sought-after award winning Palo Alto schools (Gunn High School, etc.). DSL and satellite TV and Internet connection available. Natural landscaping with mature trees, ample level lawn and patio areas for outdoor recreational. A great house for everyday living and lavish entertaining. Call (408)205-8724or (650) 947-9697 or email faribafae@gmail.com. Rent $10,500 per month. Available August 1st. Lease for at least one Year

head: Beautiful Views
Private 3 bed, 1 bath in Forestville
post: 3 bedroom 1 bathroom house in Forestville Rent is $1650, rent includes water and pg and e One year lease Deposit is $1650 Available: July 1st, or sooner This is a private and secluded 3 bedroom, 1 bath Forestville home, down a private lane with lots of trees and very few houses nearby. The house has an open floor plan, and the kitchen, living room, and dining room are all open with large windows and sliding glass doors out to the balcony. There are high ceilings and lots of double-paned windows and forest views. There is a wood burning fireplace in the living room, and the house has central propane heating as well. There is a completely remodeled kitchen with maple cabinets, quartz countertops, and new flooring. The rental includes all new stainless steel appliances (stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave.) There is an on demand water heater, and all of the lights have dimmer switches. The outdoor areas include a large patio, large balcony, and large fenced yard, which currently has a chicken coop in it. There is also a hot tub on the patio which may or may not be included in the rental. There is a granny unit on the property. The granny unit is below the house. It has a completely separate entrance and separate parking area, so you might never see this tenant. Currently the granny unit is available June 20, and we might consider renting both to the same person if you are interested. The cost for the granny unit would be approximately an additional $800, with no subleting. This rental includes a shared washer and dryer located in the separate utility room, which is shared with the tennant in the granny unit. There is also room for additional storage space if needed. Location: Near River Rd. and Scenic Dr. This is a private location in the forest, close to the regional parks for river access and hiking. It is not in the flood zone. It is approximately 12 minutes to the 101, 16 minutes to Sebastopol, and 5 minutes to downtown Forestville. You must fill out an application, have good credit, and references. If you are interested, please email me your contact information and a little about yourself. No dogs, a cat might be considered with an additional deposit. No Drugs or smoking. The house is currently occupied, and the house cannot be seen without an appointment. I will be showing the house on: Sunday, June 23rd from 11:00 - 12:00. If you absolutely cannot make these times, please email me, and I can try to arrange another time. I prefer to be contacted by email. If you want to ask questions via phone, please send me an email as well. For questions, please call: 707-820-1035 **If this add is still up, the house is still available.**

Our Apartment Interior Design Features Include: -96 ceilings with exposed brick in many units -Oversized 8 birch wood doors with stainless steel hardware -Expansive windows with city and bay views in many units -Custom lighting throughout -Gourmet kitchens with custom cabinetry, honed granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, high-end fixtures -Baths finished with custom cabinetry, honed limestone countertops, porcelain soaking tubs, vessel sinks, high-end fixtures -Bedrooms with distinctive wood and glass sliding wall panels, polished chrome, dual-head ceiling fans -High gloss, color-dyed concrete floors -Custom lighting throughout -Washer and dryer in unit -Central heating and cooling -Private outdoor balconies with sliding glass doors in many units Potrero Launch is at the center of one of San Franciscos most flourishing and sunniest neighborhoods: Central Waterfront / Dogpatch. post: Our Downtown Fremont apartments near Central Park are located in the ideal San Francisco Bay Area neighborhood. Located in Fremont on the East Bay, The Rexford provides a location convenient to I-880, putting you en route to some of the Bay Areas largest employers, as well as the cultural hub that is San Francisco itself. Living in Fremont gives you the distinct pleasure of being close to the great outdoors, while still staying connected in an urban environment. Stretch your legs and get some fresh air at Central Park, Quarry Lakes Regional Recreation Area, Lake Elizabeth, or play at the Aqua Adventure Water Park, all a short distance from The Rexford. When it comes to the daily essentials that one must consider before selecting a new home, youll soon discover that The Rexford is in the perfect location for your needs. For families with children, Scribbles Montessori School operates on-site, Washington High School is just across the street, and Glenmoor Elementary School just a few short blocks away. When it comes to taking care of your health, Fremont Hospital and Washington Hospital Healthcare System are both easily accessible from The Rexford.

head: 4 Bedroom in Forestville with separate office/granny
post: Rent: $2300 Deposit: $2300 1 Year lease Available: July 1st, maybe sooner This is a private and secluded 4 bedroom, 2 bath Forestville home, down a private lane with lots of trees and very few houses nearby. This house has a unique layout it has 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom upstairs. And 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom downstairs, with a full kitchen. The downstairs has a completely separate enterance and could be used as an office/granny. There is no subletting allowed for the granny unit. UPSTAIRS DESCRIPTION: The house has an open floor plan, and the kitchen, living room, and dining room are all open with large windows and sliding glass doors out to the balcony. There are high ceilings and lots of double-paned windows and forest views. There is a wood burning fireplace in the living room, and the house has central propane heating as well. There is a completely remodeled kitchen with maple cabinets, quartz countertops, and new flooring. The rental includes all new stainless steel appliances (stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave.) There is an on demand water heater, and all of the lights have dimmer switches. The outdoor areas include a large patio, large balcony, and large fenced yard, which currently has a chicken coop in it. There is also a hot tub on the patio which may or may not be included in the rental. DOWNSTAIRS DESCRIPTION: This is a 1 bedroom studio that has been recently remodeled. Everything in brand new. The kitchen has maple cabinets, quartz countertops, new flooring, and it includes all appliances (stove, refrigerator, microwave.) The main room has new paint, an alcove with windows and skylights, 2 closets, a propane heater, and double paned windows. The bathroom is also brand new with a tile floor, new contemporary vanity, new lighting fixtures, and an over-sized soaking tub with shower. Location: Near River Rd. and Scenic Dr. This is a private location in the forest, close to the regional parks for river access and hiking. It is not in the flood zone. It is approximately 12 minutes to the 101, 16 minutes to Sebastopol, and 5 minutes to downtown Forestville. You must fill out an application, have good credit, and references. If you are interested, please email me your contact information and a little about yourself. No dogs, a cat might be considered with an additional deposit. No Drugs or smoking. The house is currently occupied, and the house cannot be seen without an appointment. I will be showing the house on: Sunday, June 23rd from 11:00 - 12:00. If you absolutely cannot make these times, please email me, and I can try to arrange another time. I prefer to be contacted by email. If you want to ask questions via phone, please send me an email as well. For questions, please call: 707-820-1035 **If this add is still up, the house is still available.**

head: Brand New B3 Lofts - Open Houses Every Sat/Sun
post: Every Saturday & Sunday from 12pm - 4pm 5200 Adeline Street, between 46th and 53rd (look for the balloons) Warning: this is still an active construction site. Wear appropriate footwear. Located on the border between Oakland and Emeryville, the B3 Lofts is the newly built third and final phase of Madison Parks Bakery Lofts community. B3 Lofts will add an additional 79 apartments, lofts, commercial space and a café to the Bakery Lofts community, bringing the total amount of residential units to 172. Starting in August, 18 of the 79 units will be ready to rent! These will include 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom/2bath, 2 bedroom + loft/2bath, and 3 bedroom/2bath units. They will feature stainless steal appliances, granite counter tops, stained concrete floors, and plenty of closet space. Off-street parking in a gated lot is included (one spot). Prices range from $1,750 to $2,950 depending on bedroom type and square footage. Close to numerous nearby shopping areas, neighborhoods, groceries, entertainment, freeways and to public transportation. MacArthur Bart is a 5 min drive away. The 18 units opening in August will be pet-friendly, but we reserve the right to pre-screen pets and accept only indoor cats and fixed dogs and cats. 2 pet maximum. Pet deposit required-- $500 per dog/$250 per cat. One year leases, security deposits are equal to one months rent plus additional for pets, gate openers, and other circumstances. Because of the high volume of calls received, email is the best way to contact us. Contact Hannah@mpfcorp.com For more information and updates, visit our website mpfcorp.com/B3.html Bakery Lofts, A Madison Park community Bakery, B2, B3, B4 Lofts

head: Timeless Beauty - furnished / unfurnished - 4BR - 2 parking ~ J.Wavro
post: Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com San Francisco - Russian Hill - House for rent Rent: Pets: Behind a secure fence, down a brick garden path, is a very special home. Built in 1904, this home has been renovated, expanded and updated throughout the years. Now it is a stately 2 level house with a huge garden path in front of the home on 1/4 acre back from the street. And, there is a roof deck with panoramic views of Golden Gate Bridge and the Bay!  The house itself has a large porch designed with a trellis above the veranda  - perfect for casual dining and enjoying the lush garden in front of the house.  This is what relaxation is all about. The specially designed windows and multiple skylights throughout the house bring in plenty of light. This house is approximately 2800sf. Enter into a lovely formal living room with sweeping cathedral ceilings, a wood burning/gas fireplace and elegant furnishings -- this has been referred to as the conservatory great room.  Furnishings include a piano which is optional. The formal dining room is raised 3 steps up from the living room, separating it, but allowing for large family gatherings or formal entertaining. The large, fully equipped kitchen has plenty of storage, good counter space, stainless steel appliances, including a Viking gas stove, and a custom built hutch.  2 full bathrooms are downstairs. Also on the first floor is a library with built in bookcases and plenty of room for a desk and office equipment. This can easily become the 4th bedroom as there are pocket doors that close. Walk up the elegant staircase to find 3 large bedrooms -- 2 with walk-in closets -- and 2 more full bathrooms. Both have jacuzzi tubs and one has a steam shower. Lots of skylights keep this home bright throughout the year.  In addition, there is a roof deck with views of Golden Gate Bridge and the Bay. 1 car garage and a parking space in front of the driveway - 2 car tandem - for $350. This is an oasis in the center of the City. It doesnt get much better than this. Close to Michaelangelo Park with playgrounds within walking distance. A dog is negotiable. post: Beautiful 2,600 Sqft. 4 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom home on a private drive. This home is very spacious and features a formal living room and dining room with a wet bar, a large family room with a fireplace, a breakfast nook adjacent to the kitchen, and a deck with views of the hills. The kitchen has tile countertops, a garden box window, a full pantry, raised oven, an electric cook top, and a side-by-side refrigerator/freezer. The first floor also has a half bathroom, a big storage closet, and access to the three-car garage. Up the grand staircase near the entryway are all of the bedrooms and a laundry room with washer/dryerhookups. Each bedroom has access to an en-suite bath. Two of the rooms share a Jack and Jill bathroom, while the third bedroom and master bedroom both have private en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom features a fireplace, his and her walk-in closets, and a spacious en-suite bath with a deep soaking tub, separate shower, and dual sinks. Within a block of the home is a private park with benches, a large grass field, and a play structure. This home is located within minutes of highway 80 and 580, and very close to Wildcat Canyon Regional Park, the San Pablo Reservoir, and many areas with shopping and restaurants. head: Sunny Marina 3BR/2 bath Condo- W/D and parking!
post: This is a rare FULL floor condo overlooking the Marinas wonderful George Moscone Park and Recreation Center. From your living room window you have an unobstructed green view of the tennis courts, baseball fields, Marina Library, the childrens playground and Recreation Center. Through this greenbelt you see the Golden Gate Bridge and full on western exposure floods the unit with sun. There is a large living room spanning the 25 foot width of the building with a separate over-sized formal dining room. The living room has a lovely large fireplace. The eat-in kitchen is spacious and central, while the long hallway leads you to 3 quiet and large bedrooms and 2 full baths, one of which is dedicated to the master-suite. New LG over-sized side by side washer and dryer are directly in the unit, in a separate laundry closet and there is also a large one car side by side parking space as well as additional storage and a small landscaped and shared yard. The building is comprised of only 3 units and yet has an elevator. The location cant be topped, one block off of Chestnut Street and all its wonderful shops and restaurants, two blocks from the Marina and all the outdoor wonder of San Francisco, but on a particularly quiet street as there are only house on one side of the block. This is a fantastic unit in a perfect location that is perfect for a family with kids or for anyone who wants to step out their door and have immediate access to everything you could wish for. head: Welcome to your new condo
post: This luxury 2 floor, 2 bedroom 2.5 bath end-unit townhome has panoramic views of the Marina and the Golden Gate Bridge. The entrance opens up to a living room with floor to ceiling, double paned windows and the rental includes use of a the preexisting wall mounted 58 HD TV. The first level also includes a half bath, upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a dining area that leads to the first level outside deck, which includes additional storage and a grilling area. There are two separate staircases that lead to the second floor where youll find two master suites and a landing area. The master bedroom also has floor to ceiling double paned windows, views of the Golden Gate Bridge, and a jetted tub with a separate stand up shower in the master bath. This second level also includes the 2nd bedroom, with views of the Golden Gate Bridge as well, along with the 2nd full bath attached. The laundry closet with washer & dryer included as well as stairs that lead to the privately deeded rooftop deck can be found on the landing area between the two master suites. This unit has a private area on the rooftop with panoramic views (and use of existing teak patio furniture) of San Francisco, including the Bay, the Golden Gate Bridge, the Presidio, Pac Heights, as well as views of Transamerica Bldg, BofA Bldg, and Fort Mason. The unit comes with 1 car secure parking in Bldg with large additional Storage area. FEATURES: -Desirable end-unit -New Hardwood Floors in main living area -Gas Fireplace -58 TV included (mounted on living room wall) -Kitchen Appliances included -New Washer & Dryer included - Lots of Additional Storage -Secured 1-Car Garage -Additional street parking and parking garage within 1 block ($250/mth) AMENITIES: -Secured building with intercom entry system -SFMTA Parking Permit - (fee per vehicle & maximum of 4 per residence) -1 block from Restaurants/Bars and Shopping on both Chestnut Street and Union Street -Minutes from Marina Greens and Crissy Field -Steps from GOOGLE Shuttle -Easy access to freeways I-280, I-80 and HWY101, Marina, downtown San Francisco, the Financial District, and all modes of public transportation; Muni & Golden Gate Transit -Muni Lines: 22, 28, 28L, 30, 30X, 41, 43, 45, 91 -Golden Gate Transit: 2, 4, 8, 10, 18, 24, 27, 38, 44, 54, 56, 58, 70, 72, 74, 76, 80, 93, 101 SHOWINGS: By appointment only APPLICATION PROCESS: -Fill out application upon request LEASING TERMS: -Available NOW -$6100 - 24 month lease -$6300 - 12 month lease -Security Deposit of $6,300 -Tenant(s) pays PG&E; (Gas & Electric) - average bill is under $70/mth, Cable, Internet -Water & Trash included in rent

head: What will it look like when we are done?

Now if we could just get the supplies out of the building and clean the bamboo floors, I could take a few pictures and let this place show off how really great it is. This almost 120 year old Victorian was completely redone five or six years ago. The previous owners mother occupied the upstairs. And while she didnt exactly only drive it to church on Sundays, you get the idea. The remodel included new plumbing and an electrical upgrade. Your toilets will flush, and the three prong plugs really are grounded. Bonus: They also added a lot more storage space than you usually get with a Victorian. Theres a private porch in the back that will become your bonus room. post: Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com San Francisco - Glen Park - House for rent Rent: Pets: Soon available - a gorgeous brand new 3 level furnished home in Glen Park for a 12-18 month rental. Close to Bart, parks, gourmet market, cheese shop, and plenty of restaurants.  Over 3300sf. There are panoramic views of the southern part of the City and partial Bay views. Top floor has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The luxury master bedroom has a king size tempurpedic mattress and pillows. The master bathroom has a skylight and includes a rain shower and soaking tub. There is a large private deck off the master bedroom with patio furniture to enjoy the views. One of the other 2 bedrooms has 2 single beds and the other bedroom has a queen size mattress. There is a 2nd bathroom on this floor as well. The main floor is an open floor plan with gourmet kitchen -- custom white lacquered cabinets, Carrera marble countertops, and stainless steel Viking appliances. There is a walk in pantry, a breakfast bar, dining area, family room, fireplace and 1/2 bath. The lower floor is a 2nd master suite with over 1200sf of open space. There is a queen size bed, full bathroom, 65 flat screen TV, sofa, wet bar, treadmill, laundry room and sliding glass doors onto the backyard. The yard is beautifully landscaped with a barbecue, garden, automatic sprinklers and dining table and chairs. There is also a queen size blow up mattress available. This home is fully furnished with modern, gorgeous furniture. One car garage, easy street parking, DirecTV, wireless internet, alarm system, Sonos sound system throughout the house, gas fireplace and all baby necessities are provided. All utilities included. Available around November 1, 2013 for up to 15 months. No pets and no smoking, please. Chenery Street & Mateo St, San Francisco, CA Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com

head: Brand New Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment, #411 Available Now
post: Cats Dogs Description Unit is unfurnished. Photos are of a staged unit. One compact parking space available for $275/month. Pacific Terrace is a brand new luxury apartment building conveniently located on the corner of Pacific and Polk. Select units have breathtaking views of the Golden Gate Bridge and Russian Hill. Residents will enjoy a rooftop deck and private courtyard with lounge area and barbecue grill. Each unit is equipped with its own washer and dryer. Peninsula shuttles are located merely two blocks from the building. Amenities: Lease Terms One Year Lease Term Additional Photos $4,825 /month Contact Meridian Management Group Yoli Handoko 415-490-6006 Map About Russian Hill Russian Hill is an upscale neighborhood with many distinct characteristics. Its most popular attraction is Lombard Street, which is known as the crookedest street in the world due to its seven sharp turns. Similarly, many of the sidewalks are stairways due to the steepness of the streets of this neighborhood. Russian Hill does have a lot of popular restaurants and shops down Hyde Street, and is nearby North Beach, which has even more shops. With significantly less crime than other areas of San Francisco, Russian Hill is a great place to live. MMG204

head: Big remodeled apt w/private yard nr Berkeley, Rockridge, hwy 24
post: Now you can rent a remodeled 1-bedroom on the Berkeley border - available August 1st.. One year lease required. Please read this entire ad before contacting me. (That will save us both same back-and-forth over email.) Four photos are below, but you can see more photos here: - 650 square feet (bigger than many 2-bedroom apartments) - Ground floor of a quiet triplex - Sunny windows on three sides - Two closets - Enormous kitchen with granite counters and huge sunny window - Private fenced yard area - Offstreet parking - Easy street parking for your guests Also, the front door opens to the yard. So unlike condos in larger complexes UPS can deliver packages directly to your front door (instead of leaving yellow sticky notes, and making you pick up your packages). There is no laundry in the building, but theres a door-to-door laundry service I use. They pick up your dirty laundry, wash, dry, fold, and return it perfectly folded to your door. Its about $30 for two weeks of laundry (per person). There are also laundrimats nearby. The only utility I pay for is trash pickup. You are responsible for water, gas, electric, phone, cable TV, etc. If you want to, you can chip in for a third of my high speed Internet bill and share my wifi. There is a very large closet in the bedroom, and a small closet in the hallway. GREAT LOCATION: - Halfway btwn the Ashby BART and Rockridge BART stations - 17 blocks from Berkeley Bowl - 7 blocks from the entrance to hwy 24 - Walking distance to the Nomad Cafe - Quiet street with trees, not a through street - The only people who drive here are the neighbors. Most neighboring houses are owner-occupied. That means most of the neighbors are mature and stable people. Its not a transient neighborhood. RECENT RENOVATIONS: - New double pane windows - New pergo flooring (looks like hardwood) - New paint - New fridge - New granite countertop - New stainless steel kitchen sink - New bathroom vanity - New faucets, doorknobs, ceiling lights, etc - The building features new exterior paint, gutters, and landscaping. Im a freelance writer who lives/works right above this apartment. I and the back tenant are both very quiet. However, I sing for 30-45 minutes per day, and you will hear that. I need a quiet environment to concentrate. Ive also promised my back tenant and my roommate that this is a quiet building. So if you have a very quiet lifestyle, Im willing to compensate you for it. The official rent is $1395, but I offer a good tenant rebate of $100/month. The rebate is for paying rent on time, maintaining renters insurance, not smoking anywhere on the premises, and not disturbing me or the back tenant. If you are a single person, I offer an additional $45/month discount. Thats because there will be less wear-and-tear and also less trash, so my trash collection bill will be smaller. The current tenant tells me that in her living room and bedroom (which are right under my office), the loudest volume that doesnt disturb me is music played directly from her laptop, at the max level, with no attachable speakers. (Or TV at a comparable volume level.) In her kitchen, using attachable computer speakers doesnt bother me. Thats because its not right under my office. Most of my current and past tenants have qualified for the rebate every single month. In the worst cast, a tenant forfeited the rebate one month out of the whole year. If your rental application is accepted, I will give you contact information for my current and past tenants so you can confirm this. The security deposit is $1,500. Cats OK. Absolutely no dogs. I imagine this apt will rent quickly, even though its not available until August 1st. If you are not able to come see the apartment in person right away, you can either (1) send a Bay area friend to view it for you or (2) ask me to email you a rental application, and apply without seeing it. I will be checking your credit, as well as your landlord and employer references, so please only contact me if all that will check out. I will show the apt at these times: Wed 6/19 at 6pm Sat 6/22 at 12 noon Sun 6/23 at 2pm Each showing only takes 5 minutes, and once a showing is over I will be leaving for other appointments. So if youd like to come, please arrive promptly or a few minutes early. (If you get here early, you can wait in the driveway or the fenced part of the front yard.) 5740 Maccall St, Oakland 94609 (corner of 58th St).

head: Beautiful Home in Piedmont Pines
post: Live in the idyllic setting of Piedmont Pines, close to parks, and still a swift drive to the highway. This is a two bedroom/one bath apartment on the first floor of a single family home. The kitchenette in the large living room is new (stainless steel appliances and all) and the bathroom is updated. All rooms have a light-filled view of a small canyon and trees. There is a private entrance via a massive wrap-around 500 square foot deck, with a view of the canyon and peeks of the bay. The deck is perfect for entertaining and for al fresco dining and drinks. The bedrooms are large and have ample closet space (one bedroom has a walk-in closet). There is also a full garage space for extra storage or a small car. Private laundry in the apartment. Piedmont Pines has some of the best schools in the Bay Area. The house is located at the end of a safe dead end street (no traffic). A shared high speed internet service and all utilities are included in rent. This apartment is perfect for anyone, including and especially a small family. The rent is $2200/month for a year-long lease ($2200 deposit and last months rent required) or $3000 month-to-month (with a $3000 deposit). $35 credit check. Trained small pets welcome with additional deposit. No smoking on any part of the property, please (inside and outside). Available July 15. Please write for appointment.

post: Great 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Midtown Palo Alto , on a quiet street but only 1/2 block from Middlefield and 1/2 mile from Oregon Expressway. A 24/7 Safeway/CVS Pharmacy/Walgreens/Starbucks are just around the corner plus restaurants, banks, video rentals, dry cleaners, etc. Unique apartment with wood beam ceilings, skylights and a very large, Fully Enclosed, Private yard including a covered patio. Recently remodeled kitchen with maple cabinets, tile floors, self cleaning oven, microwave and dishwasher. New hardwood floors throughout the living room, hall and bedroom. Remodeled bathroom has a new ultra chic vanity and mirror. Part of a small (24 unit), 1-story complex so no upstairs neighbors to keep you up at night! You even have your own individual address (no apt #) and private trash collection right outside your gate (no long walks to a smelly dumpster). Meticulously maintained by the same owner for over 25 years. The owner just replaced the sliding patio door/window in the living room and the picture window/side windows in the bedroom which will make the apartment cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter. A great place in which to live and SAVE ENERGY! Cats are more than welcome--with a separate private entrance to your yard they can roam freely if theyd like. Private reserved parking plus ample street parking for extra vehicles. Low security deposit of $800. Apartment will be available July 13. Rent is $2,145 a month - 1 year lease required. Please call for an appointment to view. This is a great place to live. On average, our residents have lived here for over 6 years! They just love the location, yard and unit layout. Come see what makes them stay so long! Call 650-799-0813 for appointment to see our apartment.

head: Large Gorgeous Furnished Home, with Views- ReLISTO
post: The Home: This beautiful 5 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom single family home in the quiet neighborhood of Forest Hills has sweeping views of South San Francisco, Mt. Davidson, San Bruno Mountain and the Pacific Ocean. Nestled in the treelined street, this residence comes fully equipped with everything required to fully enjoy your stay in San Francisco. Rare to find amenities such as an outdoor hot tub, jacuzzi bath, formal dining room, and piano are just some of the great features. PHOTOS & click on Green Tabs: VIRTUAL TOUR: Main Level: The statley living room features a fireplace, television, built in speakers, WiFi, and baby grand piano. The formal dining room flows into the gourmet kitchen with updated gas appliances, kitchen island, two sinks, sub zero refrigerator and multiple appliances to create a wonderful meal. Enjoy your morning brew in the breakfast area adjacent to large window, fully appreciating the many sunny days granted to Forest Hill residents. Upstairs: The open, southern style staircase next to a multistory window, welcomes you to the Master Bedroom Suite. Featuring a king size bed, fireplace, walk in closet, and views of Southern San Francisco to start your day. The Master bath is adorned with tile, double vanity, jacuzzi tub and walk in shower. Lower Level: A game room, complete with pool table or ping pong table, balcony and its own bathroom are the perfect getaway from the day to day grind. Laundry, and garage parking are also on this level. Patio: The hot tub says it all. The patio is well protected by a wooden fence providing a restful backyard experience. If you feel like some gardening, there is an antique potting table at your disposal. Price includes all utilities, wifi, cable and alarm system. Price is based on a 3 month lease and may vary based on season and length of stay. KEY DETAILS - Family room can be converted to a 6th bedroom. We welcome Corporate Rentals also. Price based on season and length of term (and sometimes depending on furnished or unfurnished home). Deborah Chan ReLISTO - Leasing Agents for Owner Broker Associate / DRE License #01199008 1318 Hayes Street, San Francisco, CA 94117 415-236-6116 x108 Rental listings subject to change at any time. Agent believes all information contained herein to be correct, but assumes no legal responsibility for the accuracy, any errors, or any omissions.

head: This Gorgeous 1BR/1BA Apartment Is Your New Home!

post: Welcome to a charming community featuring brand new interiors with granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, air conditioning, in-home washer and dryer. Enjoy the weather with a barbecue and a picnic in the shade of our towering redwoods, before warming at the fire pits as the sun sets. Using the latest environmentally-friendly technologies, the designers individually selected each material and feature, bringing superior energy efficiency, incredible indoor air quality, and water conservation to the community. That means you’ll save money on utility bills. But that’s not all. By using recycled and sustainably harvested lumber, it’s all part of the effort to reduce waste and save our forests. post: Available around August 1, 2013. Enjoy this beautiful spacious 1 bedroom 1.5 bath townhome with 975 sq. ft. of living space at the San Jose City Lights Community. Characteristic of this unit is that it feels like living in your own little house. There is no one above you or below you. The front door opens on the ground floor to an entry foyer with a storage closet, laundry area with extra storage space, and direct access to an attached garage for two-car tandem parking. The second floor features the living room, dining area, kitchen, a half-bath for guests, and a spacious balcony. The master bedroom with full bath en suite is privately located on the third floor. There are also two separate sinks and a walk-in closet. Bedroom window opens to a beautiful tranquil view of Communications Hill. Whats more. . .. there is a gas fireplace and accent lighting in the living room. The kitchen is appointed with beautiful maple cabinetry and a breakfast bar. Unit is equipped with gas stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, garbage disposal, washer, dryer, central forced air heat and air conditioning. and custom shutters. This is truly a lovely home with many attentive details for comfortable living. Perfect for a single professional, executive, or a couple. Amenities in the condo community include a pool and spa. Property is located conveniently in South San Jose, with close access to major highways (US 87/85, 101), and proximity to shopping, parks, VTA, etc. Minimum one year lease. head: Rem.1 BDR Apart. avail. on July 1, Viewing Wed. 6/19 in the evening
post: This lovely unfurnished Apartment is in a separate 2 units section of a small 3 story building. Such a design provides privacy next to a single family house. The section type of design makes also the building rigid, which is an extremely important safety feature in case of an earthquake. Past earthquakes, including the big one of 1989, have not caused any damages to the building. There is a large tree in front of the building moderating heating of this unit during the hot season. This Apartment consists of:  Entrance hall with a closet  Good size living room  Bedroom with a large closet.  Huge renovated eat-in kitchen equipped with almost brand new 4 burner gas range with oven, almost brand new refrigerator and a lot of cabinets. The kitchen has also a desk/office area.  Full size bathroom with a shower over tub  Very large private storage room in the basement equipped with sprinklers  Garbage shut  Shared backyard This apartment was recently substantially remodeled. The building is located in one of the best, most desirable areas of the city, on Guerrero St. between 24th St.& and 23d St. BART station and Muni bus and street car lines are two blocks away.. Google and Facebook Shuttle stops is less than 1 block from the building. Other Hi-Tec company (Such as Apple, Yahoo) buses are also in a walking distance. Easy access to both 101 and 280 freeways.
