head: CLOSE TO BART STUDIO/JR 1BR
post: About the unit: Ground floor Junior 1br/studio available for rent (likely available in August or September, though flexible for earlier or later dates) in a newer condo building, built in 2005, total of approximately 60 units. Though it serves more like a one-bedroom than a studio, it does not have a door enclosing the bedroom off from the remaining living space, so technically it is listed as a studio. However, the layout is such that it provides a remarkable amount of privacy; not that privacy should be much needed if living alone. Although it would work for a couple, this unit is more ideally suited for one individual given the overall size, 700sqft. Water and garbage are included in the rent. One year lease required and $1,000 security deposit due before move-in. *One designated parking spot in gated garage. *Gated condo complex. *Tall ceilings with track lighting. *Radiant heated flooring. *GE energy efficient stainless steel appliances: gas range, bottom freezer refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave (with the appliances and radiant heating, the PG&E; bill will rarely exceed $20 per month. The unit currently averages about $13-15 per month!). *High efficiency washer/dryer in the unit. *Granite counter tops in kitchen and bathroom. *Brazilian cherry hardwood floors in main living area. *Carpet floor in the bedroom/sleeping alcove. *Tile in the bathroom. No A/C but I have never had a need for it. Large school style windows swing open for cross-ventilation. Temperatures are very mild. No balcony or patio area. No pets. No smokers. No storage. Smaller closet (might run into some issues if youre a clothes horse). About the location: Perfect for professional commuting to SF or downtown Oakland. Even better/closer for someone working in the Emeryville business corridor (Pixar/Novartis/Zip/Jamba Juice/Peets/Whole Foods). MacArthur BART is 5 blocks away, a short 8-10 minute walk. The free Emery-Go-Round has a stop a block and a half away. One block away is AC Transit stop. Easy freeway access to 80 east/north to Napa, Sonoma, Sacramento regions, 580 and 24 east to the Tri-Valley, 880 south to San Jose and the Bay Bridge to SF. Great neighborhood eats and nightlife. Emeryville has Cafe Biere, Arizmendi, Los Cantaros, Miyozen, Lanesplitter, Townhome, Bucci, Wallys, Rudys, Bay Street Plaza, Public Market, Honor Bar, Prizefighter, Brown Sugar Kitchen. Temescal area on Telegraph has Bakesale Betty, Home Room, Asmara, Pizzaiolo, Dona Tomas, Burma Superstar, Koryo, Barlata, Lanesplitter, Kansai, Sahn Maru, KangNam, Genova Deli. Uptown Oakland has Fox Theatre/Fox Den, Le Cheval, Paramount, Hopscotch, Flora, Lukas Taproom, Ozumo, Pho 84. Rockridge/College Ave. gems are an easy 10 minute bike ride or one stop on BART. Berkeley/Elmwood neighborhood is 15 minutes away by bike and 1-2 stops on BART. Lake Merritt/Lakeshore Drive/Grand Ave. is a short 5 minute drive or 15 minutes by bike. Email if youre interested to discuss further.

head: Spacious floorplans with lots of light, choose Brookdale as your home
Awesome Top Floor Home!
Lovely, elegant condo in excellent location
post: Come home to a roomy 1 bedroom, 1 bath condominium! It is a front unit in a small building, so you have a view of lovely Victorians and trees. The neighbors are quiet & friendly. Relax in a spacious living area with floor to ceiling windows (almost an entire wall!) to let in the sun. This wall of widows includes a wide sliding glass door out to a balcony, for your own outdoor space, where you can dine, read, or just enjoy the view. Chill out in front of a fire in the working fireplace. Dine with friends in the adjacent dining area, which has space enough to comfortably fit a table and 6 chairs. Enjoy cooking in a roomy, elegant, well-appointed kitchen, which features granite counters, ample cabinet space & high quality appliances: electric stove, generous fridge, dishwasher & ample cabinet space. The bedroom is big enough to fit a king bed comfortably, with room left over, and has 1 large and 1 smaller closet. There is another large closet, fronted by mirrored doors, in hallway leading to the main living area. The bathroom is almost all white: White tiled shower over tub, white tile floor (with tiny diamonds of black), white sink with white marble vanity, and white w.c. -- just waiting for you to spice up with your own colored towels & accessories. There is a shower door, so you dont even need a shower curtain. The entire apartment, except the bathroom, is floored in light-colored hardwood. The lighting system is exceptional -- halogen lights on dimmer switches for warm, bright lighting that can be lowered to set a romantic mood. The building has an elevator for convenient move-in and out, as well as for daily use. There is a coin-operated laundry on the lobby floor, shared by just 10 units, which is both convenient and safe. The neighborhood is quiet. Shopping and restaurants are steps away on Fillmore St. There is easy access to bus lines. No smokers. The condo is available July 1. To see it, please email with your name, phone number and direct email. As the unit currently has a tenant in it, it can only be shown from 9AM - 5PM, and only with 24 hours notice. Please note that - there is NO parking with the unit - this price is the price unfurnished. Some of the furniture may be rented for a small additional amount.

The house is centrally located to San Jose, San Francisco and Oakland airports. If interested, please reply via email and tell me a little about yourself. post: Evelyn Gardens, a wonderful place to live. Its all about you! If location, location, location is what you are after, youll never regret a move to Evelyn Gardens. Close to bus and train lines, easy access to 101 ... you can get anywhere from here! Rest assured you wont experience a harried workday morning with transportation availability close at hand. head: RE: FREE MONTH-Large Condo in North Vallejo, NICE
post: DONT rent at this place. 1455 and 1457 North Camino Alto.What they fail to mention (IN THIS AD) is that, theres an on site manager name ED that lives there and gives everyone that RENTS and doesnt OWN a condo here a hard time. Hell find little things to report you so the HOA can contact your landlord and later evict you. Its a very uncomfortable place to live knowing that ED is out there and finding a way to get you evicted because you dont own a condo here. Hell treat the owners good, but treat the tenants of the owners of the condos like criminals. ED is very hard to get along with and thats why previous tenants have had problems with him and thats why the apartment at this time is vacant !! The person you rent from does bot care about the stress or sleepless nights that you may have while living here. as long as the rent is paid !!! they dis not support what my family and I had to say.RENTER BEWARE !! Im sharing this because I have two children and nobody should go thru what Ive just gone thru with this on site manager.. God blesss and good luck!

It is centrally located with affordable rents. The blocks closest to Market Street tend to be gritty with a fair share of homeless. However, the rest of the area has some nice pockets, with the best being closest to Nob Hill. Overall, the neighborhood is well located in SF and its popular among art students since you can find decent studios for reasonable prices. Its close to the theaters, Union Square, and there are some tasty ethnic restaurants. Photo by: Wikipedia User Aude

head: Gorgeous 2Bed/2Bath Unit Downstairs!!!
post: Its a buyers market, and my boss swore pigs would fly before he lowered the rents on his prize apartment community even though we had vacancies up the gazoo just a couple months ago. I cut those rents till we had a queue of drooling prospects hanging out of our door waving checks.  Weve got just a few of those giveaway-priced, stunning apartment homes left.  You can save hundreds (yes, thats plural) of dollars a month over other comparable apartment communities in our area.  That could be an extra car payment, or a family vacation!  We offer the ultimate in comfort and elegance, well-appointed with wood-burning fireplaces and spacious floorplans.  Stunning landscaping includes fountains, bridges, & lakes, and beautiful Laurel Creek Park is across the street.  The manicured common areas have a sparkling pool, heated spa, and clubhouse. Theres an on-site laundry facility. Conveniently close to the I-80 freeway, good neighbors, attentive management, and a great location in a primarily single family residential area near schools and shopping.  Look at the pictures on their website and youll see what an incredible deal youre getting!  And when you visit us, pay no attention to the overhead swarm of flying pigs.  Theyre perfectly harmless.  Call 707-428-3465 to schedule a tour. Bring your umbrella and your skillet (for the flying bacon). Please mention Ad Code MV34 and check out: *No Section 8*

head: Arbors Brand New 1 Bedroom
Ocean Views, Remodeled Modern Flat!
post: Nestled atop Mt Sutro with panoramic ocean and city views, 321 Crestmont Dr feels like a little piece of Marin tucked in the heart of SF! Freshly remodeled, this 4 bedroom / 3.5 bath flat is spacious and bright and features hardwood floors in the living areas, new berber carpets in the bedrooms, all new bathrooms, fireplaces in the living room and master bedroom, and a modern kitchen with a top-of-the-line Diva induction cooktop. In addition, two balconies allow for indoor / outdoor living and maximization of the views. Also included are one garaged parking space and an in-unit washer dryer. This is a two-level, top floor unit with an at grade entrance. The ground floor enters into the spacious living room which wraps around the dual sided fireplace to the open dining room and kitchen. The second floor houses all the bedrooms and full bathrooms. Located in Forest Knolls adjacent to Twin Peaks and Ashbury Heights, 321 Crestmont is a 10 minute walk down to bustling Inner Sunset, 20 minute walk to Cole Valley, and a quick ride down the hill to West Portal, Haight / Ashbury, and Castro / Upper Market. In addition, it is directly across the street from the trees, trails, and gardens of Mt. Sutro Park. - 4 bedroom / 3.5 bathrooms; unfurnished - One car garage and ample street parking - washer / dryer, dishwasher - 1 year lease; no short-term inquiries please - Pets considered on a case-by-case basis Available immediately or July 1. Please email with any questions or to schedule a tour! Thanks, Tracy

head: 2 Level LOFT in Walnut Creek- walk to BART & downtown
post: Open view over the trees from your living room & upstairs bedroom. Unique 1 bedroom loft. Stylish interior with large living room, kitchen with all stainless steel appliances, plenty of closets and balcony with storage too! Energy, cultural depth and a tranquil park-like setting await you at The Boulders. Enjoy the best of the East Bay living in these luxury Walnut Creek apartments. Down dog it at Bikram Yoga, pamper your car at the Auto Spa, sample some ceviche at the Havana, or drive to Mt. Diablo for a day hike and see vistas that the first Bolbones Indians experienced long ago. The downtown street patterns of Walnut Creek, laid out by pioneer Homer Shuey on one of his large cattle ranches in 1871, still guide motorists today. The apartments themselves are brand new inside with top of the line finishes (granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and of course washer/dryers and air conditioning). The Clay Arts Guild located nearby features open studios so you can learn to throw that pot or take in a performance at the Lesher Center for Performing Arts. The Boulders is located just off Highway 680 and Highway 24. A free shuttle operates between the central district and the Walnut Creek BART transit lines.

head: Secluded Mountain Retreat in Kentfield with pool
post: Commune with nature in this very private hilltop architect designed 2+ bedroom, 2 bath home located on 2 acres. Great entertaining house with large decks and swimming pool in a park like setting. Panoramic views of Mt. Tam, Mt Baldy, San Rafael, and Corte Madera Creek. This house is located at the end of a private road that serves 3 other houses. Available June 20. Easy access to Hwy 101 and 580. Located in Bacich School District. Hardwood floors cover the majority of the house beginning in the large impressive entry. The kitchen features a gas cooktop, dishwasher, stainless steel double ovens and stainless steel refrigerator, with a sliding glass door opening to the deck, backyard and pool. The living room had expansive views of Mt Tam, San Rafael, Mt Baldy, Corte Madera Creek, with a large cobblestone fireplace, built in bar and built in shelving. The formal dining room has hardwood floors, a sliding glass door opening to the deck, backyard and pool as well as a side window with views of Tam. The family room has built in shelves and a view of Mt Baldy. The bedrooms have plush wall to wall carpeting. The master bedroom features a second cobblestone gas fireplace, a large sliding glass door to its own private deck with a view of the backyard and pool. There is a ton of closet space and a large private bathroom with separate tub, shower, and commode. Home also includes 3 decks for enjoying outdoor living as well as a pool. There is a large 2 car garage with storage, washer, dryer. contact 510 912-5800

head: Experience the ocean waves just steps away from could be your new home
post: You cant get much closer to the ocean then 301 3rd in the heart of Pacifica CA. $3000 per month with unobstructed views of the ocean from both bedrooms we do not expect this home to be available for very long. This 2 bed 2 bath home is ideally situated on the corner of 3rd and Dalberg and comes with a fully fenced yard. It is expected that this home will be available for occupancy sometime in late July or early August. Month to month rentals and pet friendly environment are features that make our park truly unique. This home features a modern kitchen that comes equipped with tiled counter tops a refrigerator, gas range with microwave hood, dishwasher, stainless steel sink and garbage disposal. With a dark cherry laminate hardwood floors and a fully fenced yard it is perfect for small pets . A full size washer and gas dryer, gas central heat, duel pane windows, with lots of cabinets and ocean views from both bedrooms are just a few of the amenities. Imagine falling asleep to the gentle sound of the surf, and waking to the cool kiss of ocean mist. All of this in a wonderful community featuring our newly renovated Club House with full kitchen and hardwood dining tables with matching chairs. Join us for friendly conversation, or one of our game nights. Our clubhouse features and old fashioned brick fireplace that is perfect for warming up after a swim in our pool. Our common areas are not so common as we have a BBQ area near the Club House kitchen, full restrooms and showers as well as a small Laundromat. Whether you are young or just young at heart, we welcome you to our community at Pacific Skies Estates. For further information please contact Stephe or Charlene at (650) 355-4001 or on the web at JKester@aol.com . Our office hours are 9 AM to 4 PM 7 days a week.
